section.name: MagicDraw Installation
section.p: This page provides directions to configure Rational Software Modeler / Architect, tools for creating UML models. AndroMDA support these tools thanks to their ability to export models to EMF / UML2 files. During the rest of this tutorial, RSM will designate both Rational Software Modeler and Rational Software Architect
Set up a path variables in RSM specifying the location of your Maven 2 repository. Models generated by AndroMDApp contain references to this variables.

ul.li: Choose Window > Preferences from the main menu.
Click on Create... in the Path Map panel.
Enter m2repository in the Name field.
Enter the location of your Maven 2 repository in the Location field, e.g. C:\Documents and Settings\your user name\.m2\repository
